title: What are abstract thoughts and which ones are concrete? - Quora

response.answer_text: All thoughts are abstract! The word “concrete” means that “something” exists physically. Whatever existing in earthly reality, whatever existing within cosmic universe, in galaxies, in Nature, as human body substance, as “something existing physically” exists, can be said, to exist physically concrete. Anything existing physically concrete your five senses can physically concretely sense experience____touch, taste, smell. hear, see. The word “ideas” that tell you the name of the physical material concrete existing, that explain, that define the physical material concrete your human body sense experiences exist “abstract.” Thoughts, thinking, explaining, defining that which exists physically concrete, “as ideas” exist abstractly. Your human physical body substance cannot name, explain, define that which your human physical body substance sense experiences. Worded “abstract ideas” do that for you. The word ”concrete” exists as an abstract “idea.” Where did the “abstract idea” come from? Where do word “ideas” come from? Where do “ideas” come form? How do you know what physical anything IS? What do you name the physical anything? How do you name a physical anything you physically sense experienced? Where do “ideas” come from? Thought “ideas” exist abstractly! You cannot concretely physically sense experience a thought, an “idea?” You can physically sense experience a physical manifestation which the thought, the idea, physically created, however, you cannot physically sense experience the thought, or, the “idea.”
